text: (visvasavantayini!) anatha daruvanta taruna viyata pat vana turu (ovunge depala araksa karannan vasayen sitina) oba, sadharana andamata misa, ovunge depalavalata lam novanu. (obage) poronduva oba paripurana vasayen itu karanu. mandayat (paralovadi) poronduva gÃ¦na (oba vetin niyata vasayenma) prasna karanu lÃ¦be
